data.name: NEON STRUCT Demo
data.detailed_description:
You are Jillian Cleary: an ex-spy on the run, framed for treason and hunted by your former agency. You must move in secret, survive off the grid, and find a way to clear your name. Old friends and new allies will lend their support; but with the eyes of the world upon you, who can you trust?

The demo of NEON STRUCT contains the first two missions of the complete game.
data.about_the_game:
You are Jillian Cleary: an ex-spy on the run, framed for treason and hunted by your former agency. You must move in secret, survive off the grid, and find a way to clear your name. Old friends and new allies will lend their support; but with the eyes of the world upon you, who can you trust?

The demo of NEON STRUCT contains the first two missions of the complete game.
data.short_description: You are Jillian Cleary: an ex-spy on the run, framed for treason and hunted by your former agency. You must move in secret, survive off the grid, and find a way to clear your name. Old friends and new allies will lend their support; but with the eyes of the world upon you, who can you trust?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0-compliant device with 512MB memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card, GeForce 9/Radeon HD 3000 series or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 Snow Leopard or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.7 Lion or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1-compliant device with 512MB memory
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card, GeForce 9/Radeon HD 3000 series or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
